name: Dunage
description:
This game was made in less than 48 hours for Ludum Dare 44.

You have to find your way out of the dungeon, but the place is crawling with monsters! There's a misterious magic cristal ball that heals you, but you must give something in exchange... Your life.
How old will you be at the end of this adventure?

Controls:
ASWD - Move character
Space - invincibility roll (it have no animation, but trust me, it's a invincibility roll XD)
Left Mouse Click - Attack and interact with objects

It's pretty simple, but I hope you enjoy it! 
And please, leave a review if you have any time, this would help me so much, and I would be very grateful for it =)
